snippet: CUNNINGHAM--Bill. The Trustees and staff of The Frick Collection feel deeply the loss of Bill Cunningham. He was one of the first photographers to shoot our events regularly, and did so particularly often over the last 20 years. The results in print, online, and video were keenly anticipated, but equally meaningful to us was the warmth and unforgettable spirit he brought to each occasion. He was the embodiment of joy as he moved among us New Yorkers, a chronicler and ambassador the likes of whom we may never know again. We offer our sincere condolences to his colleagues, close friends, and all who shared with us a love of Bill. Margot Bogert, Chairman Ian Wardropper, Director 1/3
lead_paragraph: CUNNINGHAM--Bill. The Trustees and staff of The Frick Collection feel deeply the loss of Bill Cunningham. He was one of the first photographers to shoot our events regularly, and did so particularly often over the last 20 years. The results in print, online, and video were keenly anticipated, but equally meaningful to us was the warmth and unforgettable spirit he brought to each occasion. He was the embodiment of joy as he moved among us New Yorkers, a chronicler and ambassador the likes of whom we may never know again. We offer our sincere condolences to his colleagues, close friends, and all who shared with us a love of Bill. Margot Bogert, Chairman Ian Wardropper, Director 1/3
